transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER THE HON PJ KEATING MP WHITE PAPER ON EMPLOYMENT, INDUSTRY AND REGIONAL DEVELOPMENT
transcript.content:
0
PRIME MINISTER
STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP
WHITE PAPER ON EMPLOYMENT, INDUSTRY AND REGIONAL
DEVELOPMENT In view of the importance of the Government's forthcoming White Paper on
employment, industry and regional development, I have decided it would be
appropriate for it to be delivered in Federal Parliament.
Accordingly, I shall deliver the statement in Federal Parliament on
Wednesday, May 4, instead of the previously proposed date of April 28.
CANBERRA April 14, 1994
